title: Fair go!
creator_credit: Penny Robbins, Peter Moon, Tony Wright and Open Channel Productions
brief_description: “Fair go!” is a step towards meeting the needs of young people for information about their rights as workers. Using a fresh, entertaining presentation, the program follows the experiences of school-leavers Kelly and Sam, as they fall unawares into a series of near disasters in new jobs.
